text.div:
HL7BEReferralPrescriptionWGImplementationGuideworkinprogress

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

https://www.ehealth.fgov.be/standards/fhir/referral/ImplementationGuide/hl7.fhir.be.referral

name: HL7BEReferralPrescriptionWGImplementationGuideworkinprogress
title: HL7 BE Referral Prescription WG Implementation Guide (work in progress)

resource.name: BeLabPrescription
resource.description: This is the Belgian profile for a laboratory order.

resource.name: BePerformerTask
resource.description: Subtask performed by one performer

resource.name: BeReferralPrescription
resource.description: The common structure for referral prescription.

resource.name: BeReferralPrescriptionDiagnosticImaging
resource.description:
Referral prescription for a generic diagnostic imaging.
Please note in .orderDetail, a specific slicing is available to give guidance how to express acquisition modalities if needed. In future iterations of this profile, more slicing might provide additional guidance.

resource.name: BeReferralPrescriptionNursing
resource.description: The nursing profile, generic version. Please note the nursing referral for medication does NOT depend on this generic version but is a FHIR prodfile on a different FHIR resource (MedicationRequest)

resource.name: BeReferralPrescriptionNursingGenMedication
resource.description: The nursing profile specialized for medication. Note this profile is based on the FHIR resource MedicationRequest. Dosage is expected initially to be given in the corresponding text and optional site fields (as per the NIHDI requirements).

resource.name: BeReferralTask
resource.description: The task that is referred to in the referral prescription

resource.name: BeCoPrescriber
resource.description: Other practitioners that must take part in this prescripiton

resource.name: BeCoPrescriberInfo
resource.description: Info about the other practitioners that must take part in this prescripiton

resource.name: BeContraindication
resource.description: Contra indication in a prescription referral for diagnostic imaging.

resource.name: BeContrastFluidUse
resource.description: Whether the use of contrast fluid in diagnostic imaging can be defined as 'If necessary' or 'Not permitted.'

resource.name: BeExecutionPeriod
resource.description: Begin and enddate of the execution of the request

resource.name: BeFeedbackToPrescriber
resource.description: Does the prescriber request feedback?

resource.name: BeInformParty
resource.description: Extra parties that need to be informed of the outcome, besides the prescriber.

resource.name: BeLatestDraftDate
resource.description: Request must leave draft status before

resource.name: BeLatestEndDate
resource.description: Request must be performed before

resource.name: BePSSInfo
resource.description: Information regarding the Prescription Search Support

resource.name: BePerformerReference
resource.description: BePerformerReference

resource.name: BePerformerTaskReference
resource.description: BePerformerTaskReference

resource.name: BeProposalType
resource.description: Type of proposal

resource.name: BeSupportingInfo
resource.description: Relevant clinical information in the context of this prescription concerning for example allergies, kidney function, diabetic. This extension allows the use of an Annotation or codeableConcept but when more detailed information can be given, it is RECOMMENDED to express it as structured as possible using the appropriate elements.

resource.name: BeTaskReference
resource.description: BeTaskReference

resource.name: BeUrgentCommunication
resource.description: When there is a need to urgently communicate results of an order.

resource.name: BeValidityPeriod
resource.description: Begin and enddate of the validity of the request

resource.name: BeDiagnosticImagingPrescription
resource.description: Logical model describing the model for the diagnostic imaging prescription. This draft is used in the HL7 Belgian workgroup for referral.

resource.name: BeLaboratoryPrescription
resource.description: Logical model describing the model for the prescription laboratory. This draft is used in the HL7 Belgian workgroup for laboratory.

resource.name: BeModelReferralPrescription
resource.description: Logical model describing the model for the prescription referral. This draft is used in the HL7 Belgian workgroup for referral.

resource.name: BeCoPrescriptionStatus
resource.description: This is the status of the prescription for the coprescriber

resource.name: BeCommunicationMethod
resource.description: Codes to define a communication method.

resource.name: BeContrastFluidUse
resource.description: Codes to define the use of contrast fluid.

resource.name: BeNursingType
resource.description: Codes to define a type of nursing.

resource.name: BePrescriptionStatus
resource.description: This is the status of the prescription

resource.name: BeReasonReferralStatus
resource.description: Codes to explain the current status of a referral prescription.

resource.name: BeCSCoPrescriberChoice
resource.description: Type of intended performer choice

resource.name: BeCommunicationCode
resource.description: Communication codes in Belgium. To define a specific method of communicating. Initially defined as supporting CodeSystem for the referral prescription.

resource.name: BeContrastFluidUse
resource.description: Whether use of contrast fluid should be considered.

resource.name: BeNursingCode
resource.description: Nursing codes in Belgium. To define a high level in nursing activities. Initially defined as supporting CodeSystem for the referral prescription.

resource.name: BeNursingCodeCompressiontherapy
resource.description: Nursing codes in Belgium. To define details in nursing activities for compression therapy. Initially defined as supporting CodeSystem for the referral prescription.

resource.name: BePrescriptionProposalType
resource.description: Prescription Proposal Type. Indicates the type of proposal (new or prolongation) as from the uses cases by NIHDI

resource.name: BePrescriptionStatus
resource.description: Prescription status in Belgium. Initially defined as supporting CodeSystem for the referral prescription.

resource.name: BeStatusReason
resource.description: Status reason in Belgium. Initially defined as supporting CodeSystem for the referral prescription.

resource.name: BeNSCoronalertcode
resource.description: Code as generated by the Coronalert app.

resource.name: BeNSSpecimen
resource.description: National identifier for a specimen when needed.

resource.name: BeUnadressedHealthMessageExchangePlatform
resource.description: UHMEP naming system

resource.name: be-op-cancel
resource.description: Cancel Referral Prescription or Proposal

resource.name: BeReferralCategory
resource.description: Codes to define the high level category for a referral prescription. SNOMED-CT codes in this valueset are just a draft proposal to give a general idea - pending an official valueset.
